mapper.select: select a.cover_id, a.create_time, a.id, a.title, c.name as coverImg from article a left join articleCover c on a.cover_id = c.id where 1 = 1 and year(a.create_time) = #{year} and month(a.create_time) = #{month} order by year(a.create_time) desc, month(a.create_time) desc, day(a.create_time) desc
select year(create_time) year, month(create_time) month, count(*) articleNum from article group by year(create_time), month(create_time) order by year DESC, month DESC
